title: 1st visit since lockdown
text: This was my first visit after lockdown. Have been looking forward to this treat since before lockdown and my daughters and I were not disappointed. Still the great quality that we expect from Cup. They did everything right to protect their customers and staff. Hand sanitiser temp check as you enter and tables socially distanced. Well done Cup. As always your staff were lovely, well organised and a credit to your organisation. Thank you. We will be back

title: Well organised
text: We visited the West Kirk on Sunday night. The changes that have been put in place to mitigate the effects of Covid 19 are working well and have been well thought out. With hand sanitiser at the entrance, one-way system of entry, staff wearing facemasks and contact details taken when we ordered the food. We felt safe in the knowledge that the staff were working well to safeguard our health and their own making our visit safe and relaxed. Well done West Kirk I will be back again.

title: Good atmosphere
text: Lovely comfortable surroundings, The staff are very helpful and the food is great. It has a well stocked bar and well worth a visit if you are in Funchal

title: Great place for a holiday
text: I went to the Casino Park to celebrate my birthday. I had a fatastic time. The staff were lovely, welcoming and very well trained. The Hotel is an iconic building designed by renowned architect Oscar Niemeyer. It has the most amazing infinity pool and gardens. The breakfast buffet is one of the best I have seen. It is well placed for the centre of Funchal. I would also like to thank the staff for making my birthday special. The hotel sent me a bottle of Champagne to celebrate with and the gift was much apprciated. So please Casino park thank you for making my holiday so very special. Your staff are exemplary.

title: First visit to the Hard Rock
text: First visit to the Hard Rock Cafe in Athens although I have been to a few other. The staff were welcoming and helpful. We had the local legend burger which was very tasty. This a great place to drop into if you have had a busy day sightseeing. Replenish your fluids with one of their beers, they are cool and refreshing and as with all the Hard Rock Cafes the music is good

title: Great to be back
text: We first visited the Acropolis many years ago when you could still walk inside the Parthenon. It was great to see how the site is being restored. The views from the Acropolis are stunning especially if you are there when the sun begins to set. Amazing place well worth a visit

title: Amazing place
text: This museum is well worth a visit for the artefacts alone but donâ€™t miss the restaurant it has great views and great food. The staff were friendly and helpful. This place is a must for anyone visiting Athens

title: Crazy decor
text: What can I say, crazy Christmas decor but great food and welcoming staff. Really enjoyed ourselves and sometimes you have to try something new

title: Amazing place
text: I have to say I was well impressed with the HRH Tenerife. The hotel was everything I expect of a Hard Rock Hotel. The staff were amazing and nothing was too much trouble for them. The hotel was clean, comfortable and welcoming. You made our holiday great. Thanks

title: No Complaints
text: Long flight but we were well entertained with the videos on board. Truth be told the flight was so smooth I slept a big part of the way so no complaints from me

title: Serving Draught Beer
text: If your looking for draught beers whilst in Orlando this is the place to go. They also have an extensive list of whisky an gin

title: Lovely relaxed atmosphere
text: Visited Olive Garden whilst on holiday in Orlando. After a busy day in the parks we went in to have a meal. The staff were lovely, the food great. We thoroughly enjoyed our meal and will definitely return

title: Great Food, great venu
text: I ate at this restaurant with my daughter. We had a lovely meal and the service was great. I love Thai food and really enjoyed the Chicken Penang Curry very much, would recommend to anyone. Well worth a visit

title: Handy for Amsterdam
text: This is a warm, clean and comfortable hotel. The staff are pleasant and very helpful. The hotel is a short walk from the station and 2 stops gets you into Amsterdam. There are lots of Restaurants and pubs nearby as well as supermarkets and shops. We enjoyed our stay in this hotel and will return again.

title: A Hidden gem
text: This is a really nice place to hang out in the middle of Amsterdam. As well as the beautiful plants, large greenhouses,butterfly house it also has a lovely coffee house. Well worth a visit if you want to chill out. I always visit when I am in Amsterdam as there are lots of wee corners to sit and chill.

title: Great place to chill out
text: This is a lovely space to chill out in and enjoy a coffee or light lunch. It is bright, clean with well trained helpful staff on hand. I love having a coffee here

title: Nice meal , helpful staff
text: We went to this restaurant while we were staying in Zaandam. We had a lovely dinner and although busy we did not feel rushed, the staff were great. Well worth a try if you are in the area

title: Lovely Cafe. great coffee
text: Great coffee, great staff and free Wi-Fi what more could you ask. Try the cookies they are great too

title: Dropped in for a beer
text: Dropped in for a beer whilst out walking in Amsterdam. As usual for a Hard Rock, the atmosphere was great with come good music playing. Had a lovely beer and a chill out

title: Lovely Space
text: This cafe is situated in a lovely space with stunning views overlooking the sea at Lerwick. The coffee and cakes are great, the staff lovely if a bit slow. The atmosphere is relaxed and welcoming. The furniture needs a lot more TLC as many of the seats and tables are showing signs of wear and are badly in need of replacement. However a great place to go on a rainy day. With free Wi-Fi it's a great place to check the emails or do some computer work. Well worth a visit

title: Lovely Views
text: Fort Charlotte is in the Centre of Lerwick and easy to access. The views are great as you can watch the boats come and go in the harbour below, It's lovely on a good day but it can be windy. Could do with a few seats so visitors can enjoy the space. For those of you who play Pokemon Go there are 3 Pokestops in the Fort and a Gym nearby!

title: Very Interesting Exhibition
text: This is a well laid out interesting museum that is close to the centre of Lerwick. I have visited this museum a few times and I always learn something new. A great way to spend a rainy day. There is something for all the family

title: Home from Home
text: This is the second time of staying here and it has been just as enjoyable as the last time. The rooms are warm,clean and very comfortable. The breakfast is excellent and is served in a lovely, bright welcoming breakfast room. The welcome is always warm and Jim and Lynne really make every effort to make your stay great. Well done guys

title: The place for Fish and Chips
text: I have been to this cafe on a previous trip and was looking forward to eating in this cafe since I booked my trip to Shetland. It did not disappoint, the fish and chips were amazing. It is a small cafe but clean and well run. It's a cash only place so remember to bring your purse /wallet with you

title: Well worth a visit
text: I have been here before with my husband but this time took the family as well. We had a great meal. Relaxed atmosphere and great selection of dishes. Would recommend to anyone

title: Well done - Again
text: Have visited the Tattoo a few times and this year it was amazing - as always. Really appreciated how the different musicians and dancers worked together to create a wonderful experience. This year they have outdone themselves

title: Lovely Weekend - Thanks
text: My husband and I went to this hotel for an overnight stay, a present from my daughters. The room was clean and warm with a beautiful view of the gardens. Centrally placed for all the tourist spots it was great. We had both dinner and breakfast which were most enjoyable. The breakfast buffet is one of the best I have seen in a while
place: Mercure Edinburgh City Princes Street Hotel

title: Beautiful surroundings and excellent food
text: We recently had a meeting with our business partners. The food and service were excellent. The desserts were exquisite.

title: Lovely Staff let down by poor maintenance
text:
I booked a Spa day here but was disappointed however there were some positives

Positives:
Friendly Staff
Nice Lunch
Good Massage

Negatives
The place was cold - very cold for a spa retreat. The ladies toilet on the half-landing had a hold in the window through which the wind howled. There had at some time been a ventilating fan which was now disconnected but the fins were all broken which basically meant that there was a hole through which you could see the house opposite. NEWSFLASH - what are you thinking guys get it fixed a hole in the window of the ladies toilet area is totally unacceptable. On top of this the air con in the changing rooms was blowing cold air. Your maintenance guys are really letting you down. I left before I got my second treatment of the day because I was so cold. Would I go back? Definitely not in the winter time!

title: Quirky boutique hotel
text: This hotel was welcoming and the room was certainly different - in a good way. The hotel is well placed to explore Edinburgh and is surrounded by bars and restaurants. I would describe this hotel as Boutique as it is quite small but it benefits by being able to be a bit different. This is not the type of hotel where every room is the same they are all a bit different. I just love the Dandy themed room, the Tunnocks Teacake and will definitely return if I am in Edinburgh again.

title: Business Hotel
text: We were on a holiday to celebrate our wedding anniversary, due to a mix up we were booked into the wrong hotel. This hotel is in the middle of a business area of Tokyo and although it is close to the train station unless you can read and speak Japanese well this is not the hotel for you. This is not a tourist hotel and was totally the wrong place to be if you are a tourist.The hotel itself was tired looking and reminded me of a poor quality travelodge. The staff struggled to communicate with us. We went to reception one day to ask about ordering a taxi and the staff thought we wished to book out of the hotel. There are plenty of restaurants and a supermarket nearby so you won't starve. The staff do try but few could speak English and there was little tourist information in English available or any other language for that matter). Would I return to this hotel - no. In fact I have no desire to return to Tokyo

title: Tired and not too clean
text: We were booked into this hotel on our way back from Japan for a few days. the hotel is tired and the room was not too clean. The toilet had not been properly cleaned and the bath was grubby in places. There was not much of interest in the immediate vicinity of the hotel but Taxis are cheap and we used them to get about. Wouldn't recommend this hotel for a holiday

title: Lovely Staff
text: Ate here twice during our stay in Dubai and enjoyed the meals very much. The staff were great and they even entertained us with an impromptu dance routine. Well worth a visit

title: Clean and Comfortable
text: I was staying at this hotel as I was attending a 2 day course nearby. It was warm and comfortable. The staff were welcoming and helpful. The hotel was well located for the centre of Edinburgh as I was able to walk in but there is a good bus service too

title: Lovely meal
text: I was dining on my own as I was in Edinburgh on business. I had a lovely meal and the staff were pleasant and attentive. I would recommend this to anyone looking for authentic Chinese food

title: Great Beer and Good Food
text: I visit this place regularly and had a lovely meal. There is a good choice of beers as well. Very warm and comfortable surrounding and great staff

title: Good beer
text: Good selection of craft beers good food great place for a meal with friends or family. Staff were really helpful. Been in a few times and enjoy the atmosphere and food

title: Always a great experie
text: Harry Potter rides are great and please don't forget to try the butterbeer a winner for all our family
place: The Wizarding World of Harry Potter

title: Friendly service
text: I had a lovely lunch with friends and was sad that such a wonderful place may close as the local authority is threatening to pull their funding This is a special place that provides training for some very special people. Keep up the good work folks you are doing a great job

title: Family Friendly Dining
text: This is a busy place but the staff were friendly and efficient. The food was good and I thoroughly enjoyed my meal

title: Nostalgic visit
text: Went to the Applebank to celebrate my anniversary. We used to go here regularly when we were first married. We had a lovely meal in relaxed surroundings. Service was great. All in all we really enjoyed our meal and our journey down memory lane. Thanks

title: Great place but
text: As usual we had a lovely meal in pleasant surroundings however you need to do something about the ladies toilets. One toilet has no seat, at least one toilet roll holder is broken. One wash hand basin is badly cracked and these things have been faulty for at least 3 weeks or more. Looks like you you had a war in there. Lets you down guys

title: Good Meal Service Fine
text: We enjoy visiting all the Hard Rock no mater where we are in the world. Hard Rock Cafe Biloxi was good but not great. The food was good and the memorabilia as always was good. The service was ok but not the level that I expect from Hard Rock. Give them their due though the cafe was rockin with a lot of big groups so as there were only 2 of us we were a bit lost in the melee.

title: Great Breakfast
text: We often visit McDonald's when we are travelling - the breakfasts are good and this was no9 exception. The place was clean and well run with pleasant staff and I throughly enjoyed the breakfast that I had

title: Great place for a chin-wag
text: I often go here to have lunch with my daughters. The food is great and they give you good value for money. The staff are pleasant and helpful. Great for a lunch out with friends or family memebers

title: Great place for family lunch
text: This is a busy garden centre but the service is always good the food great and you can always brouse for plants or antiques

title: Amazing views
text: Visited this hotel as part of a road trip. The hotel is great and the view from the rooms facing the sea are amazing. Sadly although the housekeeping is adequate it is not what I expect from a hotel of this calibre. However I would go back just for the view from the room

title: Well worth the visit
text: Had a lovely meal. The service was fast efficient and the staff worked together well. The food was excellent and I would quite happily return if in the area again
place: Half Shell Oyster House of Biloxi

title: Very comfortable
text: Visited this hotel on the recommendation of my daughter. We were in Edinburgh on business and this hotel is well placed in the centre of Edinburgh. There are lots of restaurants in the area. The hotel is very clean and comfortable. The staff were extremely helpful. I will certainly use this hotel again

title: School of Hard Rock
text: Thanks Hard Rock for organising this evening for your supporters, it was great fun and gave us as a family time to chill together. Look forward to more events

title: Friendly Staff
text: I celebrated my birthday by visiting Edinburgh and stayed in this hotel. It was clean, well run and the staff were friendly and helpful. There are plenty of nice Restaurants within walking distance. The Royal Yacht is across the road at the Ocean Terminal. Plenty of shopping in the area. The bus to the centre of town is just outside the hotel.
place: Holiday Inn Express Edinburgh - Leith Waterfront

title: Even in winter there are things to see
text: We visited the gardens for the first time and although it was a cold day in January there were still things to see. Some of the alpine plants were flowering and the garden itself was well laid out and interesting

title: Thanks again
text: Hard Rock never disappoints. We were there to celebrate my birthday. We had a lovely meal, the staff were great and the music was a bonus. As a VIP member I got a free entree. Thanks to all the staff we had a great time

title: Great Tour
text: The only complaint I had was it was freezing walking around Edinburgh - but it was dry and can't complain for January. Suggest you wrap up warm if you are taking this tour. The guide Patricia was great she knew her stuff and the tour was very interesting. We got some free samples so that was a bonus. Would do this tour again.

title: Breakfast Tea For Two
text: Had a lovely meal in a relaxed atmosphere. Staff were lovely and service great. This is my second time eating in Cup and will definitely be back. The scones were to die for

title: Welcoming Family Run Guest House
text: We found this to be a very well run, welcoming place. The rooms were very clean, warm and comfortable. The breakfast provided was superb, all the food cooked to order and of high quality. The Guest House is in the centre of Lerwick so is handy for the shops and restaurants

title: Value for money
text: We stayed here during a recent visit to the States and I have to say it was clean and comfortable. The WiFi worked fine. Check in was slow as we were not local and the man behind the counter seemed confused as to how to deal with non-American guests but other than that it was fine.

title: Glasgow and Hard Rock - A marriage made in Heaven
text: I have been to Hard Rock Cafe Glasgow few times and between the Glasgow Hospitality and the Hard Rock ethos this is a cafe that just Rocks - the food is excellent and the staff welcoming and friendly. This is a must see venue if you are visiting Glasgow

title: I love this place
text: My family and I have visited Kelvingrove frequently over the years and there is always something to see that is interesting. Take the time to have a coffee in the entrance, it's nice just to soak up the atmosphere

title: A taste of CRM
text: This is a great place to get a feel for CRM(Charles Rennie Mackintosh) the layout is breathtaking and gives you a feel for the man's genius. Well worth a visit

title: Love this place
text: I have eaten in here a few times the food is great. Atmosphere is relaxed . Great place to meet with friends

title: Friendly staff
text: I visit this cafe every time I come to Lerwick. The soup is great and the staff are lovely. A friendly relaxing place for a quick snack
